text: Leonard Elroy Frig (born October 23, 1950 in Lethbridge, Alberta) is a Canadian retired professional ice hockey defenceman. He played a total of 311 games in the National Hockey League (NHL). He played for the Chicago Black Hawks, Oakland Seals, Cleveland Barons, and St. Louis Blues. == Other websites == * Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:California Golden Seals players Category:Canadian ice hockey defencemen Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Cleveland Barons (NHL) players Category:Oakland Seals players Category:People from Lethbridge Category:St. Louis Blues players Category:Ice hockey people from Alberta Category:Central Professional Hockey League players
title: Len Frig
